title: The Watch That Ends the Night: Voices from the Titanic
description: "A lyrical, monumental work of fact and imagination." —  Kirkus Reviews  (starred review)Arrogance and innocence, hubris and hope — twenty-four haunting voices of the Titanic tragedy, as well as the iceberg itself, are evoked in a stunning tour de force. Slipping in telegraphs, undertaker’s reports, and other records, poet Allan Wolf offers a breathtaking, intimate glimpse at the lives behind the tragedy, told with clear-eyed compassion and astounding emotional power.
author: Allan Wolf
